channel.title: [562] [help] adding furnaces
channel.description: hello i need your help fixing my furnaces ive gone all round the map and none of them work, all it says is "object not added" then the coords this is a huge problem because it makes smithing shit and slow can any one help?

item.title: [562] [help] adding furnaces
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

You’re going to need to add in the whole smithing skill, find a tutorial and get started bro, sorry I won’t be much help in this it’s a 562…

But if you want to add no skill exp but just smelting, you could probably find a actionbutton or handler or clickingbuttons and get your system to print out what the buttonid is when it is is pressed then add a case to it and a if statement, as in if player has item etc…

Read full topic

item.title: [562] [help] adding furnaces
item.dc:creator: @lloydy269 lloydy269
item.description:
@lloydy269 wrote:

Alright, so I have added a furnace, placed it exactly where i want it ect. No more error’s saying that ‘object not added’ ect. But when I click smelt on furnace, nothing happens, same for when you use ore on furnace, or any method.
So I have located where the case should go, the Actionsender handler or what ever (Every other case is in there) But there is non for furnaces.
What would the code be for the furnace?? And obviously I know id have to replace the object ID with the ID of my furnace

Many thanks in advance.

Read full topic

Well I’m not using 562 but look for clickingobjects or actionhandler

@Kamran1 wrote:

Add a case to the object, I’m presuming Smithing has not been added to your server, therefore you’ll need to add that aswell.
